meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>exit</kanji> that <kanji>edition</kanji> out of your hands and into the world, you've gotten something published! That is <vocabulary>publishing</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
